item.description:
We'll be showing TWO episodes on the big screen (due to licensing restrictions, we are not allowed to say any titles online). If you can only come for the earlier episode, or just the later one, it's ok!

Costumes!!! (optional) Yes, that's right, you can dress up!There seemed to be plenty of interest in this when we discussed it at the last Meetup, so I think at least several people will dress up.

Trivia andÂ prizes: one member has offered to donate a prize. If anyone else has items or dollars that they wish to pitch in for this, let me know.

Admission is free, but getting seats can be done either by:

1. Reserving BUT only members can reserve (up to 4 reservations per member). Please let me know if you are a member of pn. Clickhere if you are interested in details about membership.

2. Arriving early to grab unreserved seating.

Approx. Schedule
remember--it's ok to come for just part of the night

9:00pm meet inside Popcorn Noir. If you wish to order a drink, they have soft drinks, tea, coffee, hot chocolate, wine, beer, sake, and hard ciders.

9:45 Episode A

10:40 a brief trivia contest

10:55 Episode B

You are not required to order anything, but as it's a bar/restaurant, it's welcomed and is a good way to support this awesome venue. You can actually order while the episodes are playing...they give you a special light to click so they know you want to order something. Here is a link to their menu.

Best,
Jonathon

This event is hosted by our sister Meetup Group:

Doctor Who Club of Western Mass
item.name: British Sci-Fi Night
